mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GIFTICON ORDER BY GIFTICON_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GIFTICON ( GIFTICON_CODE, BRAND_CODE, MENU_CODE, GIFTICON_NAME, GIFTICON_IMG, GIFTICON_PRICE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(GIFTICON_CODE)),0)+1 FROM GIFTICON), #{brandCode}, #{menuCode}, #{gifticonName}, #{gifticonImg}, #{gifticonPrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE GIFTICON SET #{gifticonName}, #{gifticonImg}, #{gifticonPrice} WHERE GIFTICON_CODE = #{ gifticonCode } AND BRAND_CODE = #{brandCode} AND MENU_CODE = #{menuCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GIFTICON WHERE GIFTICON_CODE = #{gifticonCode} AND BRAND_CODE = #{brandCode} AND MENU_CODE = #{menuCode}
